charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_1201_0100:
Hey, Brendan. Did you come to the woods for a
Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_1201_0200:
Yeah, there are a lot of Trainers here, so it’s
perfect for learning more about how to battle!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_1201_0300: What about you, May? Here for some fieldwork?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_1201_0400:
Yup! I was planning on checking out a few places
with Mudkip!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_1201_0500:
Cool! How about we have a little warm-up
before we both get started? Wanna battle?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_0101_0200: Here we go, then! I’m not holding back!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_0501_0100: Haha, you were really strong, May!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2311_0501_0200: *giggle* You were really strong, too, Brendan!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_1201_0100: Hi! Great weather for fieldwork, huh?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_1201_0300:
I’ve been training hard with Gallade here
on Pasio!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_1201_0400:
Let me show you how much stronger
we’ve gotten!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_1201_0500: Would you please have a battle with me?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_1201_0600: Absolutely! I’d love to have a battle with you!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_0501_0200: That was amazing, Wally! You got so strong!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_0501_0300:
Thanks to you, I think we’ve made some progress
again, May!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_0501_0400:
I’m going to keep on training and catch up to
you someday!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_0501_0600:
Maybe Marshtomp is responding to Wally’s 
feelings! It looks like she might be evolving!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2312_0501_0700: Let’s keep doing our best, Marshtomp!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0401_0400: Hi! We’re getting some fieldwork done.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0302_0500: Are you here for the waterfall?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0402_0600: Oh, hi! We’re getting some fieldwork done.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_0700:
We’re just taking a little break to let Mudkip drink
some water.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_0800: And I’m here to help May out!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_0900: May’s always really liked doing fieldwork.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1000:
If I remember correctly, it’s because your dad is
Professor Birch, right?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1100:
Yup! I was always traveling around, helping my
dad with his research. That’s what got me into
doing fieldwork!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1200: But now, I keep doing it because it’s lot of fun!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1300:
Fieldwork is why I go out adventuring in the
first place!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1400:
Meeting a lot of Pokémon and making new
discoveries is so much fun!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1500:
May’s a real go-getter, and she knows a lot
about Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1600:
That knowledge helped me out a bunch when we
were traveling around Hoenn.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1800:
It’s important to get to know more about your
friends in order to get along better, right?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_1900: That’s why I study Pokémon so much!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0401_2100: Sure! Let’s learn more about Pokémon together!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0302_2200:
Do you think I can get along with
Pokémon, too?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0402_2300:
Of course! Let’s become better friends with
our Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_2400:
Hey, if you two have some time, why don’t we
go somewhere and talk Pokémon some more?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_2500:
That’d be great! My dad was saying that there’s a
great cake shop in town!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_2600:
All right! Let’s go there and chat more
about Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_0302_3000:
Did you not get enough fieldwork
done?
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3200:
I was just imagining what it would be like if there
were wild Pokémon here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3300:
Of course, I already know there aren’t any wild
Pokémon here.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3400:
I was just thinking how nice it would be to see
Pokémon here living in a natural environment...
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3500:
Just like how Mudkip was drinking water and
swimming up that waterfall earlier.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3600:
I suppose imagining what Pokémon would do in
the wild is kind of a hobby of mine.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3700:
Maybe that’s why I can never stay away from
fieldwork for long!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3800:
The more I learn about this island, the more I keep
imagining what it would be like if there were wild
Pokémon around here.
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_3900: I think it’d be a lot of fun!
charaepi_ch0126_00_haruka/2301_1201_4200:
Chatting about Pokémon over some cake is gonna
be fun!
